analysis.description: VICToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#313-319) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol:
	Contract VICToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

VICToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#289-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#292)

VICToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#313-319)
	- /unique_chucks/37/0x865a0a003b1523fec58e4b8a956d18ecd923a315.sol#318-319
